children: Adult cardiac arrest algorithm. CPR = cardiopulmonary resuscitation; ET = endotracheal; IO = intraosseous; IV = intravenous; PEA = pulseless electrical activity; P
= partial pressure end-tidal carbon dioxide; pVT = pulseless ventricular tachycardia; VF = ventricular fibrillation.
